title: [ppc64le] FAIL: test_set_flush_denormal (__main__.TestTorch)
body_html:
hi, I just saw this error in the last few days. both for GPU and CPU only environment.
Is the test precision assertion correct ?

FAIL: test_set_flush_denormal (__main__.TestTorch)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_torch.py", line 5519, in test_set_flush_denormal
    self.assertEqual(float_tensor[1], 0.0, prec=0.0)  # tiny_float to zero
  File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 256, in assertEqual
    super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
AssertionError: 1.0005271035279194e-42 not less than or equal to 0.0 :

body:
hi,  I just saw this error in the last few days.  both for GPU and CPU only environment.
Is the test precision assertion correct ?

```
FAIL: test_set_flush_denormal (__main__.TestTorch)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_torch.py", line 5519, in test_set_flush_denormal
    self.assertEqual(float_tensor[1], 0.0, prec=0.0)  # tiny_float to zero
  File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 256, in assertEqual
    super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
AssertionError: 1.0005271035279194e-42 not less than or equal to 0.0 :
```
